title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When creating two projects, P1 and P2, selecting P2 and then closing it, the 'Open/Close Project' option is not always available in the Navigator.
EB: The 'Open/Close Project' option should always be available in the Navigator after closing a project.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Create two projects: P1 and P2.
2. Select project P2.
3. Close project P2.
4. Open the Navigator and check if the 'Open/Close Project' option is available.
